properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) count FROM PRODUCT WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT RNUM,B.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM( SELECT P.* FROM PRODUCT P WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT TO_DATE(EXPIRED_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') - SYSDATE EXP_DATE , TO_DATE(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ENR_DATE , P.* FROM PRODUCT P ) A WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
